parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A lamp. From the base of leukos; a portable lamp or other illuminator.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
A dry measure, nearly two English gallons. Of Latin origin; a modius, i.e. Certain measure for things dry.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
A couch, bed, portable bed or mat, a couch for reclining at meals, possibly also a bier. From klino; a couch.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A lamp-stand. From luchnos; a lamp-stand.
